ygData.subject: Sigh - Armor woes
ygData.msgSnippet: Working on getting ringmail from the Orcs and such in Highpass, but I am eager to get something better (and cheap!).  How good is the stuff in Unrest?  Got a
ygData.messageBody:
Working on getting ringmail from the Orcs and such in Highpass, but I am
eager to get something better (and cheap!). How good is the stuff in
Unrest? Got a couple of high level friends that keep trying to get me to
come back to place, but I just can't motivate myself. It is either go to
unrest or save up to buy banded. C'est la vie!

For the Honor and Glory of Rallos Zek;

Patty of Halas
Level 15 Warrior Princess
username: Patricia
server: Bristlebane
